verses.text: ‘Ene fuakava kia Sihova ē, Mo fai ‘ene tukumo‘ui ‘i he To‘a ‘o Sēkope:
“‘Ilo ‘e au ‘o kapau te u hū ki hoku fale tēniti, Pe heka ki he fala ‘oku ou mohe ai:
‘Ilo ‘e au ‘o kapau te u tuku hoku mata ke mohe, Pe ko hoku laumālie ke tule;
Kae‘oua ke u ‘ilo ha potu kia Sihova ē, Ha nofo‘anga ki he To‘a ‘o Sēkope.”
Vakai na‘a tau fanongo ko ‘Efalata ‘oku ‘i ai Pea tau ‘ilo ia, ‘i he vao ‘o Siali.
“Tau hū ki hono nofo‘anga ē; Tau punou he ‘ao ‘o hono tu‘unga va‘e.
Ma‘ama‘a hake, ‘Eiki, ki ho mālōlō‘anga, ‘A koe mo e ‘A‘ake ko ho mālohinga.
Ko ho‘o kau taula‘eiki ke nau kofu ‘aki ‘a e totonu, Pea ke hiki mavava ho‘o kakai lotu.
Ko e me‘a ‘i ho‘o tamaio‘eiki ko Tēvita ‘Oua te ke hanga kehe mei he fofonga ‘o ho Mīsaia.”
Kuo fuakava ‘a e ‘Eiki kia Tēvita– Ko e fo‘i mo‘oni ia: ‘e ‘ikai te ne foki mei ai– “Te u fokotu‘u mei he fua ho manava Ha taha ke nofo ho taloni.
Kapau ‘e tauhi ‘eku kovinānite ‘e ho‘o fānau, Mo e ‘ū fakamo‘oni te u ako kiate kinautolu, Ko ‘enau fānau foki, ‘o ta‘etuku, ‘E nofo ki he taloni ‘o‘ou.”
He kuo fili ‘a Saione ‘e Sihova; Kuo ne manako ki ai moano nofo‘anga.
“Ko hoku mālōlō‘anga eni, ‘o ta‘ehili: Te u nofo hē, he Kuo u manako ki ai.
Te u mātu‘aki tāpuaki‘i ‘ene tokonaki; Te u fakatopono ‘ene kau masiva ‘aki ‘a e me‘akai.
Pea te u ‘ai ki he‘ene kau taula‘eiki ‘a e fakamo‘ui moonau kofu: Pea ‘e fu‘u hiki mavava ‘ene kau lotu.
Ko e potu ko ē te u ‘ai ke talamuka ‘a e nifo ‘o Tēvita: Kuo u teu ha mama ma‘a hoku Mīsaia
Te u kofu ‘aki ‘a e mā hono ngaahi fili: Ka ko ‘Ene ‘Afio–‘e fisi hono kalauni.”
